Yes, it is possible to rename items by going to your item.cfg
Which is in the config, I guess. But this will only affect the

item.title: Max players?
item.dc:creator: @ryanandmatt ryanandmatt
item.description:
@ryanandmatt wrote:

to change max players open server.java
search
[quot]maxconnections[/quote]
then it will say a number there like

public static int MaxConnections = #;
the # change to what u wnt also the item.cfg should be there in the main section near the compiler and client.java and to rename items go to items.java *not item* find the name of the item u wnt to change and chang it

Read full topic
